entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Puntzi Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:11 AM PST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm over southwestern sections. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
